alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 16 at 1:38PM MDT until September 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...ENHANCED TO CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED FOR SUNDAY AND MONDAY ... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 134, 135, 136 AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning for low humidity and gusty winds, which is in effect from noon Sunday to 9 PM MDT Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREAS...Valley and Phillips Counties, The Little Rockies, The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge and Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties. * TIMING...During the mid-day to early evening hours both Sunday and Monday. * WINDS...For Sunday, from the west at 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. For Monday, from the west at 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...For Sunday, as low as 8 percent. For Monday, as low as 12 percent * TEMPERATURES...85 to 90 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly toward the east. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge
